topic: Large Language Model and Vision-Language Model Benchmarks and Evaluations

  proposition: Yutao Mou, Shikun Zhang, and Wei Ye published SG-Bench for evaluating LLM safety generalization across diverse tasks and prompt types.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SG-Bench|PURPOSE|evaluating LLM safety generalization
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yutao Mou|PUBLISHED|SG-Bench
    Shikun Zhang|PUBLISHED|SG-Bench
    Wei Ye|PUBLISHED|SG-Bench

  proposition: Yahan Li, Yi Wang, Yi Chang, and Yuan Wu published XTRUST for evaluating multilingual trustworthiness of large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    XTRUST|PURPOSE|evaluating multilingual trustworthiness of large language models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yahan Li|PUBLISHED|XTRUST
    Yi Wang|PUBLISHED|XTRUST
    Yi Chang|PUBLISHED|XTRUST
    Yuan Wu|PUBLISHED|XTRUST

  proposition: Tony Lee and colleagues conducted a holistic evaluation of text-to-image models in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Tony Lee|CONDUCTED|holistic evaluation of text-to-image models
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Eslam Mohamed Bakr and colleagues developed HRS-Bench, a holistic, reliable, and scalable benchmark for text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    HRS-Bench|TYPE|holistic, reliable, and scalable benchmark
    HRS-Bench|PURPOSE|evaluating text-to-image models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Eslam Mohamed Bakr|DEVELOPED|HRS-Bench

  proposition: Jaemin Cho, Abhay Zala, and Mohit Bansal probed reasoning skills and social biases of text-to-image generation models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jaemin Cho|PROBED|text-to-image generation models
    Abhay Zala|PROBED|text-to-image generation models
    Mohit Bansal|PROBED|text-to-image generation models

  proposition: Yichi Zhang and colleagues conducted a comprehensive study benchmarking trustworthiness of multimodal large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yichi Zhang|CONDUCTED|comprehensive study benchmarking trustworthiness of multimodal large language models
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Tianle Gu and colleagues developed MLLMGuard, a multi-dimensional safety evaluation suite for multimodal large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MLLMGuard|TYPE|multi-dimensional safety evaluation suite
    MLLMGuard|PURPOSE|evaluating multimodal large language models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Tianle Gu|DEVELOPED|MLLMGuard

  proposition: Xin Liu and colleagues created MM-SafetyBench for safety evaluation of multimodal large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MM-SafetyBench|PURPOSE|safety evaluation of multimodal large language models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xin Liu|CREATED|MM-SafetyBench

  proposition: Haoqin Tu and colleagues developed a safety evaluation benchmark for vision LLMs focusing on object counting.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Haoqin Tu|DEVELOPED|safety evaluation benchmark

  proposition: Rizhao Cai and colleagues created BenchLMM for benchmarking cross-style visual capability of large multimodal models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BenchLMM|PURPOSE|benchmarking cross-style visual capability of large multimodal models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Rizhao Cai|CREATED|BenchLMM

  proposition: Bohan Zhai and colleagues investigated object existence hallucinations in large vision language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Bohan Zhai|INVESTIGATED|large vision language models

  proposition: Mukai Li and colleagues conducted red teaming of visual language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Mukai Li|CONDUCTED|red teaming of visual language models

  proposition: Weidi Luo and colleagues developed JailBreakV-28K to assess robustness against jailbreak attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    JailBreakV-28K|PURPOSE|assessing robustness against jailbreak attacks
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Weidi Luo|DEVELOPED|JailBreakV-28K

  proposition: Jie Zhang and colleagues created VLBiasBench for evaluating bias in large vision-language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VLBiasBench|PURPOSE|evaluating bias in large vision-language models
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jie Zhang|CREATED|VLBiasBench

  proposition: Hongzhan Lin and colleagues developed Goat-bench for safety insights through meme-based social abuse analysis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Goat-bench|PURPOSE|safety insights through meme-based social abuse analysis
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Hongzhan Lin|DEVELOPED|Goat-bench

  proposition: Zhe Hu and colleagues created VIVA, a benchmark for vision-grounded decision-making with human values.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VIVA|PURPOSE|vision-grounded decision-making with human values
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhe Hu|CREATED|VIVA

  proposition: Zhelun Shi and colleagues assessed multimodal large language models' alignment with human values.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhelun Shi|ASSESSED|multimodal large language models
